dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 3082 IH: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 5919 Chef Menteur Highway in New Orleans, Louisiana, as the “Daryle Holloway Post Office Building”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Richmond (for himself, Mr. Scalise, Mr. Graves of Louisiana, Mr. Boustany, Mr. Abraham, and Mr. Fleming) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

form.official-title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 5919 Chef Menteur Highway in New Orleans, Louisiana, as the Daryle Holloway Post Office Building.

subsection.text: The facility of the United States Postal Service located at 5919 Chef Menteur Highway in New Orleans, Louisiana, shall be known and designated as the Daryle Holloway Post Office Building.

Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the facility referred to in subsection (a) shall be deemed to be a reference to the Daryle Holloway Post Office Building.
